      • spin

        public static void spin​(android.view.View view)
        Makes the spinner visible and locks interaction to the register page. This is ran when the user starts a request to the server.
        Parameters:
        view - View to find the spinner from.

      • spin

        public static void spin​(android.app.Activity view)
        Makes the spinner visible and locks interaction to the register page. This is ran when the user starts a request to the server.
        Parameters:
        view - View to find the spinner from.

      • unSpin

        public static void unSpin​(android.view.View view)
        Makes the spinner invisible and unlocks interaction with the register page. This is ran when a response is received from the server.
        Parameters:
        view - View to find the spinner from.

        token - Token for authentication

                                   java.lang.String username,
                                   android.content.Context context)
        Opens the account page based on the given parameters
        Parameters:
        global - Used to get the current user's account details
        username - Username of the account to open
        context - Context to start activity / volley with
